newsitem.title: USA: Calif's Fong says may seek more budget flexibility.
newsitem.headline: Calif's Fong says may seek more budget flexibility.

text.p: California state Treasurer Matt Fong said Wednesday he would meet state lawmakers to develop a plan that would help them adjust the state budget in response to unexpected changes in the economy.
Fong told reporters in a conference call from New York that such a "mechanism" would give the state greater financial flexibility and could, over time, improve its credit quality.

Fong's office explained that this mechanism would, in response to sudden or dramatic budgetary or economic changes, require state lawmakers to reassess the budget and possibly make adjustments in the course of the budget year.
Fong was in New York to meet with major credit rating agencies.
